Commands.Expression: RUN wget -q -O /tmp/apache-storm-${STORM_VERSION}.tar.gz "http://archive.apache.org/dist/storm/apache-storm-${STORM_VERSION}/apache-storm-${STORM_VERSION}.tar.gz" &&             tar -xzf /tmp/apache-storm-${STORM_VERSION}.tar.gz -C /opt &&             rm -rf ${STORM_HOME}/{ CHANGELOG.md LICENSE NOTICE README.markdown RELEASE SECURITY.md examples } &&             rm -rf /tmp/apache-storm-${STORM_VERSION}.tar.gz &&             mkdir -p ${STORM_HOME}/local &&             ln -sf ${STORM_HOME} /opt/storm
Commands.Name: onbuild
